Title: Relates to postponing the New York city 2020 tax lien sale until one year after the COVID-19 state of emergency has been lifted
Summary: Postpones the New York city 2020 tax lien sale until one year after the COVID-19 state of emergency has been lifted.
ActClause: AN ACT providing for the postponement of the New York city 2020 tax lien sale until one year after the COVID-19 state of emergency has been lifted
